function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of infectious diseases in interconnected urban areas","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, posing a threat to public health and safety","Mitigation":"Reorganizing activities and the built environment to reduce the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, urban planning and design solutions","People":"Residents of interconnected urban areas, marginalized communities","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, and city officials"},{"Description":"Social inequalities leading to higher vulnerability to infectious diseases","Impact":"Increased susceptibility of vulnerable populations to infectious diseases, contributing to higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Improving housing conditions and built environments, implementing strategic actions to protect vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Green building technologies, public health interventions","People":"Socially disadvantaged populations, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate support for vulnerable populations in the built environment","Impact":"Neglect of vulnerable populations, exacerbating the effects of pandemics and infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strategic actions to protect vulnerable populations, improving access to healthcare and housing","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring technologies, community health initiatives","People":"Vulnerable populations, marginalized communities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government agencies, community organizations"}]}
